channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Tiburon rejects 8 of 9 grand jury critiques on housing
item.description: Tiburon officials agreed with only one of nine findings in a Marin grand jury report on housing mandates, following Belvedere's lead.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Rising men’s tennis stars compete for $100,000 prize in Tiburon Challenger
item.description: Tiburon Challenger tennis tournament kicks off this weekend Sept. 28-Oct. 5 at Peninsula Club with $100,000 prize pot, 32 players.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon Wine Festival returns Oct. 4 with food, 65 wineries
item.description: 42nd annual Tiburon Wine Festival Oct. 4 at Point Tiburon Plaza features 65 wineries, 10 restaurants.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Everyday Encounter: A photographer’s second act after leaving TV behind
item.description: Arthur Drooker, 71, left three-decade TV career at 50 after father's death to pursue photography.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Pick of the Week: John Kalleen Group plays Blue Note jazz at Old St. Hilary’s
item.description: John Kalleen Group plays Blue Note jazz Sept. 28 at Old St. Hilary's Landmark, Tiburon.
item.dc:creator: The Ark

item.title: Late actor, filmmaker Robert Redford had long ties to Tiburon
item.description: Robert Redford lived on Tiburon's Ridge Road in the late 1990s and early 2000s, returning to Mar East Street from 2020 to 2024.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez
